snippet.title: Okamiden: Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready to save ancient Japan as Chibiterasu in Okamiden for the Nintendo DS. Check out the official launch trailer to the sequel of the beautiful Okami.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
